topics.body:
>be hungry
>get a cup of ramen
>go to kitchen
>get a glass to boil water in
>enter dad's gf
>"hype what the fuck are you doing use tempered glass how many times do i have to tell you not to use my glasses"
"ok"
>tempered glass has coagulated jello
>i realize that i'd have to wait for the water to heat up to get the gunk out
>wait some more for the water to boil in the microwave
>wait for the ramen to cook
fuck this, i'll eat it dry
>do just that
>come back in the kitchen a while later for some water to drink
>"hype you know that you're going to have to heat the water to get the jello out, right?"
>ignore
"hey my dad went to go get food right"
>"yeah, if you had a job you couldve gone too"

idk how much more of this i can take, the fucking sheer ignorance of this fucker is gunna kill me
